description: Number of n-step spirals on hexagonal lattice.
comments: The hexagonal lattice is the familiar 2-dimensional lattice in which each point has 6 neighbors. This is sometimes called the triangular lattice.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
G. Szekeres and A. J. Guttmann, Spiral self-avoiding walks on the triangular lattice, J. Phys. A 20 (1987), 481-493.
links: G. Nebe and N. J. A. Sloane, Home page for hexagonal (or triangular) lattice A2
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
